snippet: Apparently worried that their view was not reaching other Israelis, settlers explained their view in a Hebrew publication resembling a comic book.
abstract: Israeli settlers' umbrella organization Yesha Council announces it will print 10,000 copies of Kibush Kishkush, illustrated booklet intended to provide an easy-to-read guide to history and purpose of Israeli settlements, with end goal of increasing support for them; critics have derided booklet as propaganda, but settlers say it is necessary because of widespread ignorance about their activities among Israeli public.
lead_paragraph: Apparently worried that their view was not reaching other Israelis, settlers explained their view in a Hebrew publication resembling a comic book.

headline.main: Israeli Settlers Publish Their Reality, with Palestine as Fiction
headline.print_headline: Settlers’ Guide to Reality Has Palestinians as Fiction
